name: hm-public
description: Static assets used in The HistoryMakers' public site

scripts.build-dist: rm -Rf mkdir dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp -R web/themes/custom/hm-public-theme/static/css dist/css && cp -R web/modules/custom/thm_angular/app/dist dist/js

author: Shane Ardell <shane.ardell@thirdwavellc.com> (http://www.thirdwavellc.com)
